document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Did </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">disobey </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Him? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Just </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">one </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">time! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">Charged </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">us </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c06cff">forget </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Him </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">could'nt </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c06cff">learn! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Were </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Himself </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">such </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c8ff">Dunce </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">What </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">would </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">do? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">Love </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">dull </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">lad </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">best </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Oh, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">would'nt </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">you? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Did we disobey him?
